intent: Aggregate IT energy over time by scope
query_text: How much energy is consumed by the nodes, racks, and machine over a given period of time?

intent: Measure facility-side cooling energy over time
query_text: How much energy is consumed by the cooling system (air and water) over a given period of time?

intent: Compute PUE for a machine or room over time
query_text: What is the PUE (Power Usage Effectiveness) of a machine or compute room over a given period of time?

intent: Count concurrent jobs on a node over time
query_text: How many jobs are running on a particular node over a given period of time?

intent: Characterize resource usage prior to node failure
query_text: Provide the distribution over time of the usage of resources (CPUs, GPUs, Memory) before a node fails, over a given period of time.

intent: Relate node utilization to high PUE conditions
query_text: Give me the node’s resource utilization distribution when the PUE is higher than a given value.

intent: Relate utilization to high job PUE for a specific job
query_text: Give me the node’s resource utilization distribution for a specific JobID whose job PUE is higher than a given value.

intent: Summarize utilization for all jobs exceeding a power threshold
query_text: Give me the node’s resource utilization distribution for a specific JobID whose job power is higher than a given value.

intent: Aggregate utilization for jobs exceeding average node power thresholds
query_text: Provide the node’s resource utilization (or users) distribution for all jobs whose node’s average job power is higher than a given value.

intent: Summarize temperatures while node is in use
query_text: What are the min, max, and average temperatures when a node is in use, over a given period of time?

intent: Summarize temperature derivative during node activity
query_text: What are the min, max, and average of the derivative of temperature when a node is in use, over a given period of time?
What is the distribution of the temperature of a node before it fails, over a given period of time (period before failure)?

intent: List nodes that failed in a time window
query_text: Provide the list of failing nodes over a given period of time.

intent: Find jobs with high temperature/power conditions
query_text: Give me the Job IDs whose node’s instantaneous (or average over time) power/temperature is higher than a given threshold.

intent: Locate a node in physical topology
query_text: What is the position of node X?
How many racks are there in an HPC system X?

intent: Retrieve nodes contained in a given rack
query_text: Which nodes are part of the rack X?
How many HPC systems do we have?

intent: List users who submitted jobs in a window
query_text: Give me a list of users who submitted jobs in a specified time period.

intent: List jobs for a specific user in a window
query_text: Give me a list of jobs submitted by the user X in a specified time period.

intent: List jobs in a time window
query_text: Give me a list of jobs submitted in a specified time period.
Which user submitted job X?
Give details of job X.

intent: Count running jobs in a window
query_text: How many jobs were running in a specified time period?
How many jobs had a time duration above a certain value?

intent: List users with submissions in window
query_text: Which user submitted jobs during a specified period?

intent: Count a user's jobs on a node
query_text: How many jobs did a user U submit on a compute node N in a specified period?
Which users belong to a group G?
What is the power consumption of the node X in a specified time period?
What is the power consumption of the rack X in a specified time period?

intent: Summarize metric stats for a node over an interval
query_text: What is the max/min/avg recorded metric X for compute node N from T1 to T2?

intent: Summarize rack metric stats for today
query_text: What is the max/min/avg recorded metric X for rack R today?
What is the max/min/avg recorded metric X for Job J?
Can you tell me the list of compute nodes that had temperatures higher than normal in a specified time period?
